biotools.summary: GRMT (Generative Reconstruction of Mutation Tree from scratch) is a tool for tumor mutation tree inference from single-cell DNA sequencing data. GRMT is able to efficiently recover the chronological order of mutations and scale well to large datasets. It exploits BayesOpt to estimate error rates in mutation data based on the Bayesian optimization algorithm.
